attributes.action: ban people from hospitals who assault and/or cause harrassment, alarm and distress to hospital staff.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There were 330 attacks on staff members at Southend Hospital last year. These people should not be exposed to this kind of abuse whilst trying to do their job. Anybody who assaults and/or causes harrassment, alarm and distress to hospital staff should be banned from entering the building.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
